channel.title: 2d Gaming project | need 2d pixel artist
channel.description:
hey guys , recently i started an game project
i want to make it like pokemon/zelda style.
what i already have done
created main menu , made a tiled map and imported it created an camera class which keep track of the player made a pause menu started working on a server to handle multiplayer
in need of a pixel artist!
if you are intreseted in co developing or you are an pixel artist please contact me @ skype : dezixleader
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/2421d5cbb5cd61cee6ac224121fa14e1.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/bb969c7d2643afe495dabac55bd00512.gif[/img]

item.title: 2d Gaming project | need 2d pixel artist
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

I’m willing to donate some sprites, I know how freaking hard it is to find someone to do them for you…







These are unimplemented sprites in my game, I will continue using them, and they’re under no license, so feel free to use them.

Read full topic

item.title: 2d Gaming project | need 2d pixel artist
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:4, topic:546395”][quote author=FusionLord link=topic=665294.msg4450836#msg4450836 date=1411215316]

o.0 why is ur frame rate so low in the 2nd GIF?

Good luck anyways.

I would guessit is cause he is rendering tiles that are off screen. just a guess.
[/quote]

no he’s recording[/quote]

Redcording uses the CPU, graphic objects tend to use the GPU.

Read full topic
